question: Which among the following freedoms guaranteed by Constitution of India includes the right to know and the right to be informed as implied rights?
option4: Freedom to move freely throughout the territory of India
explanation: Article 19 (1) (a) includes the right to know and the right to be informed. Its worth note that Media (print and electronic) are the eyes and ears of the citizen and unless media freedom to report court proceedings is protected the right to know is impaired.
